head.title: Baked Stuffed Yams with Chipped Beef

directions.step:
Combine dried beef and milk in mixing bowl. Cut yams in half lengthwise and scoop out centers. Combine yams, beef-milk mixture, onion, and butter. Beat until light and fluffy. Fill yam shells with mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top. Bake in moderate oven (350 degrees) 20 minutes.
NOTES : This booklet was prepared by the Louisiana Sweet Potato Commission
Recipe by: 75 Easy Yam Recipes with a Romantic Past
Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #891 by NGavlak@aol.com on Nov 8, 1997
